full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MIG NAD MYUR DU GSO BA'I THAB GA BUR CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES MIG 'BYED SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SGO NAS MIG RGYUN DU NA BA'I NAD SRI MNAN DANG, 'BYUNG BZHI 'KHRUGS PA'I RKYEN GYI MIG NAD MYUR DU GSO BA'I THABS GA BUR CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RTZIS KYI RIG LA SHIN TU SPYANGS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS 'TSO BYED SMAN RIG PA CHOS GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I MIG NAD BCOS PA'I YI GE DPE YIG MDOR BSDUS PA ZHIG YOD PA LA GO BDE BAR RGYAS @008B PA DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA RKYEN BYAS TE BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYIS MIG BCOS PA'I GDAM NGAG LA GZHIR BZHAG TE, SLOB DPON THA SHAL BIkshU SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS BGYIS PA'O, ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN PA MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG , MIG GI NAD KHAS THAR GYUR CIG,, BKRA SHIS BAR GYUR CIG, ,)
author_simple: BIkshU SU MA TI AARTHA SIDDHI MING,
